title: SOUPERIOR MEATLOAF
directions: Combine all ingredients except Knorr® Rice Sides™ - Mushroom in large bowl. Shape into loaf in 13 x 9-inch baking or roasting pan. Bake 1 hour or until done. Let stand 10 minutes before serving. Serve with Knorr® Rice Sides™ - Mushroom.
*SUBSTITUTION: Use 3/4 cup plain dry bread crumbs.
ingredients: 1 envelope Lipton® Recipe Secrets® Onion Soup Mix
1 1/2 cups fresh bread crumbs or 3/4 cup plain dry bread crumbs
